allAges.name: Harbor House Café
allAges.desc: Comfort-food café with all-day breakfast, kid-friendly portions, and relaxed small town vibes.

allAges.name: Driftwood Grill
allAges.desc: Burgers, fries, and milkshakes a few minutes from the sand easy stop with kids after a long beach day.

allAges.name: Seabrook Corner Café
allAges.desc: Coffee, pastries, and simple breakfast plates in the heart of Seabrook’s walkable village.

allAges.name: Oyhut Bay Grill
allAges.desc: located in Oyhut Village, fine dining, great cocktails, indoor and outdoor seating, occasional live music.

allAges.name: Bennetts Fish Shack
allAges.desc: Best fish & chips, walk up ordering, fast service, full service bar/lounge with tv’s for watching sports.

allAges.name: Thian’s Thai Fusion
allAges.desc: Casual dining, open kitchen, fast service, friendly staff.

allAges.name: La Spiaggia Ristorante
allAges.desc: Traditional Italian cuisine made from scratch, intimate dining, full service bar.

allAges.name: OBR (ocean beach roasters)
allAges.desc: Café offering espresso, coffee and tea, beer and wine, pastries and good breakfast and lunch food options.

allAges.name: Galway Bay Irish Pub
allAges.desc: Restaurant and bar, fun atmosphere, irish and american food, irish whiskey and beer, live music and events, shuffleboard, darts, sports covered outdoor area, gift shop, cigar shop.

allAges.name: Dugan’s Pizza
allAges.desc: Has been in Ocean shores since 1982, good spot for families.

allAges.name: Brunch 101
allAges.desc: Discover the perfect brunch escape at Brunch 101! Carefully crafted dishes and freshly baked treats, including delicious vegan and gluten-free options.

allAges.name: Koko's Restaurant and Tequila Bar
allAges.desc: inspiration comes from both Mexican and Salvadoran cuisine

adults21.name: Tide & Tap
adults21.desc: Craft beer, coastal cocktails, and bar snacks with a locals’ hangout feel — adults-only after 8pm.

adults21.name: Railside Tavern
adults21.desc: Classic small-town tavern with pool, darts, and a cold pint after a day of driving or exploring.

adults21.name: Harbor Lounge
adults21.desc: Low-key cocktail spot a short drive from town better for date night than bringing the whole crew.

adults21.name: The Garage
adults21.desc: The Garage - Gastropub and local hangout, large tv's, great food, cocktails, beer, amazing staff and vibes, dog friendly outdoor area, open late.

adults21.name: Corks & Taps
adults21.desc: Great small plate options and fun beer and wine selections.

adults21.name: Ocean Pours Taproom
adults21.desc: Cozy small indoor area with a lot of beer, wine and cider options, and large outdoor dog friendly sitting area.

adults21.name: Porthole Pub
adults21.desc: Fun for nightlife, Karaoke and live music, local hangout, good drink and food options, good for sports, great staff, open late.

adults21.name: 8th Street Ale House
adults21.desc: Good food and drinks, Good for watching sports.

adults21.name: The Cave Bar
adults21.desc: Great prices on drinks and snacks, good for watching sports, lots of daily events, neighborhood bar, great staff.

adults21.name: The Tap Room
adults21.desc: local intimate bar, good for watching sports, some food options, open late.

adults21.name: Steam Donkey Brewing
adults21.desc: Local brewery, food truck outside, lots of beer, and cider options.

adults21.name: Rising Tide Tavern
adults21.desc: Rising Tide Tavern - Good cocktails with a variety of good food options.

shops.name: Harbor Gift Co.
shops.desc: Local gifts, coastal-themed decor, and easy souvenirs to take a bit of the harbor home with you.

shops.name: Shores Beach Shop
shops.desc: Kites, buckets, and last-minute beach gear the spot to grab what you forgot to pack.

shops.name: Seabrook General & Goods
shops.desc: Small boutique with essentials, snacks, and a few fun finds right in the village.

activities.name: Ocean Shores Beach Access
activities.desc: Wide, drive-on beach with plenty of space for walking, sandcastles, kite flying, and storm watching.

activities.name: Pacific Beach Overlook
activities.desc: Quick stop with big views of the coastline perfect for photos or a quiet moment between plans.

activities.name: Local Forest Walks
activities.desc: Short drives from Hoquiam lead to easy forest trails, great for stretching your legs between beach days.
